segments.text: Do you enjoy going on dates ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I find dates to be a lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They give me the opportunity to get to know someone better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you always have fun on dates ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not always . I don't always like the person I'm on the date with .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My date may not be my type .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So then why would you ask them out in the first place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't realize until after our date that they weren't my type .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like a huge waste of time to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that I think about it , it really is sometimes .
segments.speaker: S2
